title: 470-A
statement: A. Crystal Ball Sequencetime limit per test2 secondsmemory limit per test256 megabytesinputstdinoutputstdoutCrystal ball sequence on hexagonal lattice is defined as follows:n-th element is the number of lattice points inside a hexagon with(n+ 1)points on each side. The formula isHn= 3·n·(n+ 1) + 1. You are givenn; calculaten-th element of the sequence.InputThe only line of input contains an integern(0 ≤n≤ 9).OutputOutput then-th element of crystal ball sequence.ExamplesInput1Output7Input3Output37
